name: Born To Gallivant-Tongue And Groove
description:
Hailing from Penzance Cornwall, U.K. Tongue And Groove are a 5 piece rock outfit that share a mutual love of all things Cornish and very loud guitar music! Recorded and produced by Dare Mason in Penzance Cornwall u.k. at the V.I.P. lounge, and mastered by Dan Grigsby in New York NY, Born To Gallivant has a good Rock groove, and has been locally reviewed as a cross between The Beastie Boys and AC/DC!!! Crack open the cans, and turn it up to 11, Tongue And Groove won't disappoint!!!
(CD includes 8-page booklet)
(To anyone purchasing this Album...Many thanks for supporting the Local and Independant music scene...and to Hell with Record Labels!)

	Track list:- 
1)Oooaarrggh 
2)Bedsit Land 
3)Geevor Song 
4)Contraband Sam 
5)Cabin Fever 
6)Pasty Powered 
7)Nothin’ New 
8)Jannersville 
9)Bullet Proof Vest 
10)She’s Troubled 
11)Shirley Shebang 
12)Born To Gallivant

name: Tongue And Groove T-Shirts
description: Tongue And Groove T-Shirts. Moonlanding front & 'Born To Galivant' rear. Pictures available soon. Available in Mens: Small, Medium & Large. Womens: Xtra Small, Small, Medium & Large. High Quality.
